<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Define UI for application that draws a histogram</span>
<span class="pl-smi">ui</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> shinyUI(fluidPage(

   <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Sidebar with a slider input for number of bins </span>
   sidebarLayout(
      sidebarPanel(
        textInput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>term<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Enter your Twitter handle here:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">value</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),
        <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>Survey Questions on Side Panel</span>
                selectInput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>select<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">label</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> h5(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Gender<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),

        <span class="pl-v">selected</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span>),
        selectInput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>select<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">label</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> h5(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Race<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), 
        <span class="pl-v">choices</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-k">list</span>(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>American Indian<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Asian<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">2</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Black<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">3</span>,
                       <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Hispanic<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">4</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Multiracial<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">5</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>White<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">6</span>,
                       <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Other<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">7</span>),

        <span class="pl-v">max</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">99</span>, <span class="pl-v">value</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">60</span>),
        selectInput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>select<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">label</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> h5(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Gross Annual Income<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), 
        <span class="pl-v">choices</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-k">list</span>(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$0-10,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$10,001-20,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">2</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$20,001-30,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">3</span>,
                       <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$30,001-40,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">4</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$40,001-50,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">5</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$50,001-70,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">6</span>,
                       <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$70,001-100,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">7</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$100,001-200,000<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">8</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>$200,001 or more<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">9</span>), 
        <span class="pl-v">selected</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span>),
        selectInput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>select<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">label</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> h5(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Highest Level of Education<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), 
        <span class="pl-v">choices</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-k">list</span>(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>No HS Diploma<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>HS Diploma or GED<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">2</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Some College<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">3</span>,
                       <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Associate's Degree<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">4</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Bachelor's Degree<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">5</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Master's Degree<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">6</span>,
                       <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>PhD, MD, JD, or other Advanced Professional Degree<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">7</span>), 
        <span class="pl-v">selected</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span>),
        sliderInput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>slider1<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">label</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> div(h5(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Political Ideology<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), <span class="pl-v">style</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>width:235px;<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,
                            div(<span class="pl-v">style</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>float:left;<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>Very Liberal<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>), 
                            div(<span class="pl-v">style</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>float:right;<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>Very Conservative<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)), <span class="pl-v">min</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">0</span>, 
        <span class="pl-v">max</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">10</span>, <span class="pl-v">value</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">5</span>), 
        <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> add a submit button to delay the app from attempting to run</span>
        <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> before the user is finished typing (this also reduces lag)</span>
        submitButton(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Submit<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
      ),
      <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Show a plot of the generated distribution</span>
      mainPanel(
         plotOutput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>TwitterPlot<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),
         verbatimTextOutput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>num<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),
         verbatimTextOutput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>most_liberal<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),
         verbatimTextOutput(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>most_conservative<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),

      )
   )

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Define server logic required to draw a histogram</span>
<span class="pl-en">server</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> <span class="pl-k">function</span>(<span class="pl-smi">input</span>, <span class="pl-smi">output</span>, <span class="pl-smi">session</span>){
  <span class="pl-smi">get_followers_ideology</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> reactive({
     <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>req function prevents app from throwing error when loading without pre-given inputs</span>
    req(<span class="pl-smi">input</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">term</span>) 
    <span class="pl-smi">user</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>getUser(<span class="pl-smi">input</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">term</span>)
    <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>the 'withProgress' functions below show a loading screen during each step</span>
    <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>although this first step takes way longer to complete than the message shows</span>
    <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>particularly if the user follows a lot of people</span>
    withProgress(<span class="pl-v">message</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>getting user info<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,
                 <span class="pl-v">value</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">NULL</span>, {

                   Sys.sleep(<span class="pl-c1">0.75</span>)
                 })
    <span class="pl-smi">user_fans</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span><span class="pl-smi">user</span><span class="pl-k">$</span>getFriends()
    withProgress(<span class="pl-v">message</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>finding friends<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,
                 <span class="pl-v">value</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">NULL</span>, {

                   Sys.sleep(<span class="pl-c1">0.75</span>)
                 })
    <span class="pl-smi">user_fans</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>twListToDF((<span class="pl-smi">user_fans</span>))
    withProgress(<span class="pl-v">message</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>structuring friends data<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,
                 <span class="pl-v">value</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">NULL</span>, {

                   Sys.sleep(<span class="pl-c1">0.75</span>)
                 })
    <span class="pl-smi">followers_in_set</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span><span class="pl-smi">scores</span>[<span class="pl-smi">scores</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">twitter_handle</span> <span class="pl-k">%in%</span> <span class="pl-smi">user_fans</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">screenName</span>,]
    withProgress(<span class="pl-v">message</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>getting friends polit id scores<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,
                 <span class="pl-v">value</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">NULL</span>, {

                   Sys.sleep(<span class="pl-c1">0.75</span>)
                 })
    <span class="pl-smi">followers_in_set</span>
  })

   <span class="pl-smi">output</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">TwitterPlot</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> renderPlot({
     <span class="pl-smi">followers_in_set</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> get_followers_ideology()
     <span class="pl-smi">users_ideology_score</span><span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span>mean(<span class="pl-smi">followers_in_set</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span>)

     ggplot(<span class="pl-smi">scores</span>, aes(<span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span>))<span class="pl-k">+</span>
       geom_histogram(<span class="pl-v">color</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>gray<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span>
       geom_vline(<span class="pl-v">xintercept</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">users_ideology_score</span>, <span class="pl-v">color</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>red<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span>
       geom_text(aes(<span class="pl-c1">0</span>,<span class="pl-smi">users_ideology_score</span>,<span class="pl-v">label</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Your ideology score<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">vjust</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-c1">3</span>),<span class="pl-v">color</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>white<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span>
       theme_minimal()<span class="pl-k">+</span>
       xlab(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>liberal                                conservative<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">+</span>
       ylab(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Number of Twitter Opinion Leaders<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>) <span class="pl-k">+</span> ggtitle(paste(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Ideology score of<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-smi">input</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">term</span>))
   })

   <span class="pl-smi">output</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">num</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> renderText({
     <span class="pl-smi">d</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> get_followers_ideology()
     paste(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>You follow<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, length(<span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span>), <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Twitter opinion leaders in our dataset.<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
   })

   <span class="pl-smi">output</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">most_liberal</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> renderText({
     <span class="pl-smi">d</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> get_followers_ideology()
     paste(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>The most liberal: <span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">twitter_handle</span>[which(<span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> min(<span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span>))])
   })

   <span class="pl-smi">output</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">most_conservative</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> renderText({
     <span class="pl-smi">d</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> get_followers_ideology()
     paste(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>The most conservative: <span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">twitter_handle</span>[which(<span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> max(<span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span>))])
   })

   <span class="pl-smi">output</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">who</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> renderText({
     <span class="pl-smi">d</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> get_followers_ideology()
     paste(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>From the most liberal to the most conservative, they are: <span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, paste(<span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">twitter_handle</span>[order(<span class="pl-smi">d</span><span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">ideology_score</span>)], <span class="pl-v">collapse</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>, <span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>))
   })
}


<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Run the application </span>
shinyApp(<span class="pl-smi">ui</span>, <span class="pl-smi">server</span>)</pre></div>
